author: tatzmiki
title: Indigo NFT for Sustainable Fashion
description: People have no idea where the colors used in their clothing come from and what they are made of, and that is a serious problem for everyone.
solution: We solve the problem by creating "a new type of NFT" on ADA which contains the precise details of the colors / materials of the clothing.
experience: As a natural Indigo dye artist, I have been creating the fermenting dye over 20 years and I have a great deal of knowledge about indigo.
